{"variants":[{"guid":"86fc955a-dcba-438c-bd52-c827ef8a7088","name":"Variant A (red button, original)","isOriginal":true,"pageBuilderWidgets":null,"pageTemplate":null},{"guid":"1efd96dd-140f-4340-a1ec-78799142abfb","name":"Variant B (deep-purple button)","isOriginal":false,"pageBuilderWidgets":"{\"editableAreas\":[{\"identifier\":\"area01\",\"sections\":[{\"identifier\":\"8b8e012d-0e1b-48a7-91ce-92e8cc119361\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Section.SingleColumn\",\"properties\":null,\"zones\":[{\"identifier\":\"21cbb3ed-fd0e-4006-b02e-59307a718c91\",\"name\":\"first\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"bc415166-f230-49fe-b303-195aaae7795a\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Widget.Text\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"3fe87975-c922-45f8-b7cb-7f17343a1c03\",\"properties\":{\"text\":\"

Allergy test center partner program

\"}}]}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"b1854935-31cf-4d23-a9e5-8737dcfecd79\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Section.TwoColumn\",\"properties\":{\"leftColumnWidth\":4},\"zones\":[{\"identifier\":\"b04193d5-3653-4c58-914e-da7ad52fc7bd\",\"name\":\"first\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"d8eb2b13-751e-4610-8663-9e2d1f282fea\",\"type\":\"Kentico.Widget.RichText\",\"conditionType\":\"MedioClinic.PersonalizationCondition.ComesFromBigUsCity\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"77439af9-5a95-462e-a00f-925606e0287e\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

Modern civilization has brought entirely new challenges to our body’s immune system. During the 20th century, there was a massive expansion of industrial production. People moved more often from the countryside to the cities. In agriculture, cultivation methods began to increase food production. These new methods also started to protect food from pathogens. In addition, medical science has also seen many breakthroughs that have enabled us to deal with these pathogens even more. We no longer expose our bodies to pathogens at a steady pace. We constantly oscillate between pure cleanness and overdoses of pathogens. Whether we’re living in a large city, industrial area, or, conversely, in a clean rural environment, allergies are becoming more and more common.

Medio Clinic recognizes the growing importance of this problem. A few years ago, as a medical institution with extensive experience in medicine and laboratory analysis, we decided to expand our scope into allergies. We employ experienced physicians in all our offices who assist our patients in treating all known types of allergies.

\"}},{\"identifier\":\"227aa1f2-71d2-4490-b7ac-ccd64ae44f6e\",\"name\":\"Is for big US cities\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

Modern civilization has brought entirely new challenges to our body’s immune system. During the 20th century, there was a massive expansion of industrial production. People moved more often from the countryside to the cities. Dust and chemical substances produced in the cities hardly resemble the natural environment that humans came from. Allergies are becoming more and more common.

Medio Clinic recognizes the growing importance of this problem. A few years ago, as a medical institution with extensive experience in medicine and laboratory analysis, we decided to expand our scope into allergies. We employ experienced physicians in all our offices who assist our patients in treating all known types of allergies.

\"},\"conditionTypeParameters\":{\"isForBigCities\":true,\"variantName\":\"Is for big US cities\"}}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"946055ea-79dd-4645-a881-916bbf16e956\",\"name\":\"second\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"678c28bb-045d-4afc-a61b-128610c0b825\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Widget.Slideshow\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"2d53098f-1dfb-4f1b-b737-720fbc04fb91\",\"properties\":{\"imageGuids\":[\"c775f808-0549-4fca-ac45-dedf8c0d5652\",\"e2106013-b9f1-4dcc-bf39-4b604c461d3b\"],\"mediaLibraryName\":\"LandingPages\",\"transitionDelay\":5000,\"transitionSpeed\":300,\"displayArrowSigns\":false,\"enforceDimensions\":false,\"width\":null,\"height\":null}}]}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"91e8f7fb-8396-4182-90dc-4a75a9b5982e\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Section.TwoColumn\",\"properties\":{\"leftColumnWidth\":8},\"zones\":[{\"identifier\":\"4b8b5948-56b2-4262-a855-35d20383035c\",\"name\":\"first\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"4a3f68d1-6ff0-4bf7-9c39-17dfc57187aa\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Widget.Slideshow\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"09e70070-311f-4a91-a41f-440c39f79c38\",\"properties\":{\"imageGuids\":[\"d4f37287-11a5-46c2-8370-3f4faa1d8b8f\",\"0fdf6934-83d5-4f0e-bc16-415319a82875\"],\"mediaLibraryName\":\"LandingPages\",\"transitionDelay\":5000,\"transitionSpeed\":300,\"displayArrowSigns\":false,\"enforceDimensions\":false,\"width\":null,\"height\":null}}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"e2208a14-94ee-485a-8c13-cbe2952c34e4\",\"name\":\"second\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"caa5c656-0931-4b52-b488-606f8b5257dc\",\"type\":\"Kentico.Widget.RichText\",\"conditionType\":\"MedioClinic.PersonalizationCondition.ComesFromBigUsCity\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"e22922dc-d322-4e84-a80e-b802b7c28ce8\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

There’s an ever-growing demand for such services throughout the United States. Meanwhile, we can develop a treatment plan without the patient’s need to visit our offices physically. That’s why we’ve created a new nationwide partnership program in which our partners provide patients with a baseline test and collect samples. They then send the test results and the samples to our laboratories for thorough analysis and subsequent development of a treatment plan. Patients receive the plan directly from our physicians. They can then put it into practice with their local doctor. We designed the program for medical institutions, spas, wellness centers, or even pharmacies with sufficient facilities.

\"}},{\"identifier\":\"9fc01f7d-786a-43b1-a6a0-1e77a5bfdd13\",\"name\":\"Is for big US cities\",\"properties\":{\"content\":\"

There’s an ever-growing demand for such services throughout the major cities in the United States. Meanwhile, we can develop a treatment plan without the patient’s need to visit our offices physically. That’s why we’ve created a new nationwide partnership program in which our partners provide patients with a baseline test and collect samples. They then send the test results and the samples to our laboratories for thorough analysis and subsequent development of a treatment plan. Patients receive the plan directly from our physicians. They can then put it into practice with their local doctor. We designed the program for medical institutions, spas, wellness centers, or even pharmacies with sufficient facilities.

\"},\"conditionTypeParameters\":{\"isForBigCities\":true,\"variantName\":\"Is for big US cities\"}}]}]}]},{\"identifier\":\"a0168955-d4c4-4b67-a6cd-c77d61095c03\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Section.SingleColumn\",\"properties\":null,\"zones\":[{\"identifier\":\"774ceb44-78fb-488d-8ec7-06c84d9723ba\",\"name\":\"first\",\"widgets\":[{\"identifier\":\"a589b194-3fd6-45cd-8987-13f38762fa04\",\"type\":\"MedioClinic.Widget.Text\",\"variants\":[{\"identifier\":\"ca814a29-e5f8-4e47-bbbd-34d87a8cbbd5\",\"properties\":{\"text\":\"

If you are interested in being considered for the program, please fill out the form. In it, please also indicate the date you’re interested in joining. Please also attach a photo or at least a map of the facility. Once you have completed the form, we will get back to you within a few days.

{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"area01","sections":[{"identifier":"8b8e012d-0e1b-48a7-91ce-92e8cc119361","type":"MedioClinic.Section.SingleColumn","properties":null,"zones":[{"identifier":"21cbb3ed-fd0e-4006-b02e-59307a718c91","name":"first","widgets":[{"identifier":"bc415166-f230-49fe-b303-195aaae7795a","type":"MedioClinic.Widget.Text","variants":[{"identifier":"3fe87975-c922-45f8-b7cb-7f17343a1c03","properties":{"text":"

Allergy test center partner program

"}}]}]}]},{"identifier":"b1854935-31cf-4d23-a9e5-8737dcfecd79","type":"MedioClinic.Section.TwoColumn","properties":{"leftColumnWidth":4},"zones":[{"identifier":"b04193d5-3653-4c58-914e-da7ad52fc7bd","name":"first","widgets":[{"identifier":"d8eb2b13-751e-4610-8663-9e2d1f282fea","type":"Kentico.Widget.RichText","conditionType":"MedioClinic.PersonalizationCondition.ComesFromBigUsCity","variants":[{"identifier":"77439af9-5a95-462e-a00f-925606e0287e","properties":{"content":"

Modern civilization has brought entirely new challenges to our body’s immune system. During the 20th century, there was a massive expansion of industrial production. People moved more often from the countryside to the cities. In agriculture, cultivation methods began to increase food production. These new methods also started to protect food from pathogens. In addition, medical science has also seen many breakthroughs that have enabled us to deal with these pathogens even more. We no longer expose our bodies to pathogens at a steady pace. We constantly oscillate between pure cleanness and overdoses of pathogens. Whether we’re living in a large city, industrial area, or, conversely, in a clean rural environment, allergies are becoming more and more common.

Medio Clinic recognizes the growing importance of this problem. A few years ago, as a medical institution with extensive experience in medicine and laboratory analysis, we decided to expand our scope into allergies. We employ experienced physicians in all our offices who assist our patients in treating all known types of allergies.

"}},{"identifier":"227aa1f2-71d2-4490-b7ac-ccd64ae44f6e","name":"Is for big US cities","properties":{"content":"

Modern civilization has brought entirely new challenges to our body’s immune system. During the 20th century, there was a massive expansion of industrial production. People moved more often from the countryside to the cities. Dust and chemical substances produced in the cities hardly resemble the natural environment that humans came from. Allergies are becoming more and more common.

Medio Clinic recognizes the growing importance of this problem. A few years ago, as a medical institution with extensive experience in medicine and laboratory analysis, we decided to expand our scope into allergies. We employ experienced physicians in all our offices who assist our patients in treating all known types of allergies.

"},"conditionTypeParameters":{"isForBigCities":true,"variantName":"Is for big US cities"}}]}]},{"identifier":"946055ea-79dd-4645-a881-916bbf16e956","name":"second","widgets":[{"identifier":"678c28bb-045d-4afc-a61b-128610c0b825","type":"MedioClinic.Widget.Slideshow","variants":[{"identifier":"2d53098f-1dfb-4f1b-b737-720fbc04fb91","properties":{"imageGuids":["c775f808-0549-4fca-ac45-dedf8c0d5652","e2106013-b9f1-4dcc-bf39-4b604c461d3b"],"mediaLibraryName":"LandingPages","transitionDelay":5000,"transitionSpeed":300,"displayArrowSigns":false,"enforceDimensions":false,"width":null,"height":null}}]}]}]},{"identifier":"91e8f7fb-8396-4182-90dc-4a75a9b5982e","type":"MedioClinic.Section.TwoColumn","properties":{"leftColumnWidth":8},"zones":[{"identifier":"4b8b5948-56b2-4262-a855-35d20383035c","name":"first","widgets":[{"identifier":"4a3f68d1-6ff0-4bf7-9c39-17dfc57187aa","type":"MedioClinic.Widget.Slideshow","variants":[{"identifier":"09e70070-311f-4a91-a41f-440c39f79c38","properties":{"imageGuids":["d4f37287-11a5-46c2-8370-3f4faa1d8b8f","0fdf6934-83d5-4f0e-bc16-415319a82875"],"mediaLibraryName":"LandingPages","transitionDelay":5000,"transitionSpeed":300,"displayArrowSigns":false,"enforceDimensions":false,"width":null,"height":null}}]}]},{"identifier":"e2208a14-94ee-485a-8c13-cbe2952c34e4","name":"second","widgets":[{"identifier":"caa5c656-0931-4b52-b488-606f8b5257dc","type":"Kentico.Widget.RichText","conditionType":"MedioClinic.PersonalizationCondition.ComesFromBigUsCity","variants":[{"identifier":"e22922dc-d322-4e84-a80e-b802b7c28ce8","properties":{"content":"

There’s an ever-growing demand for such services throughout the United States. Meanwhile, we can develop a treatment plan without the patient’s need to visit our offices physically. That’s why we’ve created a new nationwide partnership program in which our partners provide patients with a baseline test and collect samples. They then send the test results and the samples to our laboratories for thorough analysis and subsequent development of a treatment plan. Patients receive the plan directly from our physicians. They can then put it into practice with their local doctor. We designed the program for medical institutions, spas, wellness centers, or even pharmacies with sufficient facilities.

"}},{"identifier":"9fc01f7d-786a-43b1-a6a0-1e77a5bfdd13","name":"Is for big US cities","properties":{"content":"

There’s an ever-growing demand for such services throughout the major cities in the United States. Meanwhile, we can develop a treatment plan without the patient’s need to visit our offices physically. That’s why we’ve created a new nationwide partnership program in which our partners provide patients with a baseline test and collect samples. They then send the test results and the samples to our laboratories for thorough analysis and subsequent development of a treatment plan. Patients receive the plan directly from our physicians. They can then put it into practice with their local doctor. We designed the program for medical institutions, spas, wellness centers, or even pharmacies with sufficient facilities.

If you are interested in being considered for the program, please fill out the form. In it, please also indicate the date you’re interested in joining. Please also attach a photo or at least a map of the facility. Once you have completed the form, we will get back to you within a few days.

"}},{"identifier":"b2575e6c-41f9-4a60-ad6c-3aab655719ab","name":"Allergy test center candidate","properties":{"content":"

Thank you for your interest in the partner program. We received your application. If you wish to change the information supplied in the form, feel free to submit the form again, with updated information.
